projects.title: kaizen Branding
projects.description: Rebranding iamadinkra which is a personal brand to kaizen av projects which is the company brand. The challenge was to seamlessly redesign iamadinkra to have this new unique feel and look, something out of the box and fresh, designing the logo, brand assets like t-shirt, documents and the brand manual.

projects.title: NFL SA Leaderboard
projects.description: A leaderboard for an NFL event in South Africa, where I use the power of react and google sheet app script to generate an api that updates realtime. This had to be done because the event was going to show the leaderboar as player partake in events.
projects.category: Website | React | API Development | Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Firebase message relay application
projects.description: The project was to develope a message application for an event where message will be sent from audience from a website which will be displayed on the event screen. This was accomplished by building two website, one for the audinece and one to display the messages and then overlayed onto the screen. For confidential purposes may only have access to the audience website.

projects.title: ad.Vantage
projects.description: An ad marketing page for iamadinkra to showcase their capability to host client advertisement on screen in various location where potential costomers may be.

projects.title: Charis Link Page
projects.description: A simple landing page for a music artist where people can visit her content on other platforms for her new album release
